title: The Historical Novel in the United States, 1960s to the Present
description: An introduction to the historical novel as it has developed in the United States since the 1960s. Exploration of how historical novels typically represent the past and the ways in which they change our notion of what counts as 'history.' 4 lectures. Crosslisted as HIST/HNRSÂ 324. Fulfills GE D5 except for History majors .
prerequisites: Completion of GE Areas A and D1
